body: Do you get credits back if you sell a badge/item? I have a badge but I accidentlly bought the wrong one, lol.

title: Selling.

replies.body: I think you'll have to negotiate with an administrator about that ^ I doubt that there's a refund policy on credit bought items, sorry.

replies.body: Sorry I don't know but I would assume that there would not be one.

replies.body: lol of course you would do this xD!

replies.body: You can't sell items. You buy it, it is yours now
